questions.question: Joaquin Phoenix is the first person to be nominated for an Oscar for playing the Joker.

questions.title: 2009 Oscars
questions.description: In 2009, Heath Ledger was posthumously nominated for a Best Supporting Oscar for playing the Joker in Christopher Nolan's Batman movie, The Dark Knight. He won the award and his family accepted it for him.
